title: FUSE ... For Noobs
author: Macro
description:
Fuse makes an explosive entrance in Apex's 8th season! If you're conFUSEd on how to play him, then you have come to the right place! #SponsoredByEA

►TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/Macro
►TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TheMacroShow
►INSTA: https://instagram.com/TheMacroShow
►MERCH: https://crowdmade.com/collections/macro
►DISCORD: https://discord.gg/macro
►MY 2ND CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSzBfLmM-DswAOKzOv8eqbA

The Intro song for this video is "I Think I'm Normal" by Carter Ace
Check him out here: https://awal.lnk.to/nWCQv

The Outro song for this video is "Bone Theme" by Michael Wyckoff
Check him out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snAWszNWhAc&t=0s

Thumbnail Art by Mahnster Art, check him out: https://www.instagram.com/mahnsterart

#Fuse #ApexLegends #Season8
